name: PingSong - #GG17
description:
Audio controlled Ping Pong. The size of the visualiser bars affects the velocity of the ball. Shout at the game to make the bars get bigger! Space and Left Click to move the paddles. 

Includes OST by Ben Mobbs: soundcloud.com/benmobbs 

Quotes about PingSong: 

"I feel like I'm being beaten to death with a bag of recycling" - Brian 

 "This is really difficult" - Shioban.
